item.description:
We're hiking Blue Hills this Sat. Parking is at the Houghton's Pond parking lot. We'll do the Skyline Trail to Blue Hill and back then maybe hike to Buck Hill. It's a 2 hour hike on rugged rocky terrain.

It looks a little rainy this weekend so bring good hiking boots and appropriate gear. If there's a lot of rain, I'll cancel in the morning.

This address should work for GPS users: 850 Hillside Street, Milton, MA.

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Blue Hills Dog Hike
